pr_title: Indicate eviction works by returning a boolean result)

timeline.bodyText: minor: internal API but adding a @return would be nice
timeline.author: vojtechtoman

timeline.bodyText: Just to double-check - the idea is to return true if eviction was performed, but not if eviction was performed and an entry was evicted (that is, return the result of evictionStrategy.evict()), correct?
timeline.author: vojtechtoman

timeline.message: Indicate eviction works by returning a boolean result
